body.name: 16-20 Pairs Shoe Storage Organizer, 4 Tiers Shoe Rack/Stand, Easy Assembly Stackable Sturdy Shoe Tower with 2 Hooks, Metal Shelf for Entryway, Closet, Garage, Bedroom, Cloakroom

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 1 min
features: 👍【2 Years After-sales Service】If there is any quality problem with our shoe holder, please feel free to contact us, we will get back to you within 12 hours, we will provide a full refund or replacement, quick response to any problematic product issues. (Contact: "Account Services" → "Order History" → "Contact Seller")

👠【Durable and Sturdy Steel Frame & Fabric Rack】This shoe shelf for closet with rust-proof structure and washable waterproof non-woven fabric, the metal shoe rack for bedroom closet is waterproof and dustproof, easy to clean, won't let debris fall on the rack below, keep every pair of shoes clean, non-woven fabric rack can well prevent baby's small shoes and high heels from sinking and falling down.

👜【Perfect shoe rack organizer】Made of thickened metal tube with a smooth rust-resistant coating and a sturdy structure with a durable waterproof non-woven compartment and reinforced plastic joints. The shelf tube is short and designed to be difficult to bend even if larger and heavier objects are placed on it, with reinforced support in the middle for strong weight-bearing capacity and balance.

👒【Easy to Assemble】Just clip the shelf in the tube and install the stackable shoe rack with the parts provided, no tools needed, quick and easy. You can also refer to our manual, article pictures or video instructions for assembly to help you reduce assembly time. Stackable connection design. You can choose to purchase 2 or more units for vertical storage to maximize.

👟【4-Tier Shoe Rack】Large capacity shoe racks can hold 16-20 pairs of shoes (can store boots, high heels, sneakers, sandals, casual shoes, children's shoes, etc.). Free standing shoe racks has hooks on both sides for easy placement of keys, wallets, etc. Shoe stand is suitable for various occasions closet, entryway, apartment, garage, living room, foyer, bedroom, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional: It is not only a shoe storage shelf/show rack, but also suitable for storing paper towels, garden tools, kids toys, pet toys, etc. A addition to home storage.

Wide range of application: Suitable for closet, entrance, dormitory, apartment, garage, living room, entryway, bedroom, office. Especially suitable for closets, behind front doors, corners, garages, making full use of vertical space.
After receiving the shoe shelf, please check to confirm the type and quantity of all parts. Please read the installation instructions or installation video before installation.

Installation instruction video Tips: When installing, please align the steel pipe with the interface of the connector, and then push it in after it is completely matched, and then tap it firmly with a wooden hammer to avoid damage to the connector.

How many pairs of adult shoes can it hold? 16-20 pairs of shoes Is it easy to install? Please refer to the manual or video instructions, it is easy to install, and the assembly can be completed in about 30 minutes. What's in the package? Package Contents: 1 x shoe holder, 1 x wooden mallet, 2 x hooks, 1 x installation instructions, 1 pair of gloves What is the size of the shoe rack? Shoe rack size: 35.43"L x 11.81"W x 29.53"H. Height per shelf: 6.3"H What is the material? Is it durable? Material: Thickened steel pipe, non-woven fabric, plastic connectors. Its steel pipe is very strong, and it is no problem to put shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together and perfect for small spaces. I was worried the shelves would be flimsy since they are made from tarp but it holds up strong. No sagging or tearing. It comes with extra parts just in case. Use a different mallet than the one provided because it kept falling apart when I used it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This shoe rack is exactly what we were looking for. It was easy to put together, holds all of our kids shoes, does not take up a ton of space, is easy to clean, and is sturdy. We have had it for over a year and it still works as good as new. It even survived a cross country move. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I think that there could be a better one out there for sure but it serves its purpose. I wear shoe size 7 and my partner wears shoe size 14. His shoes did not fit on the rack because this shoes where to big but mine fit perfectly. You can still make it work by turning them sideways. It’s low to the ground and easy to put in to closest but it breaks easily so be careful. I did disassemble it and traveled with it and so it’s easy to put back up together that’s a huge plus especially since it doesn’t use any nails or screws

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s difficult to put together at first.
reviews.reviewText: It’s not sturdy but it does fit a lot of shoes. I wanted to return it but ended up keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shelf was OK. Just what I expected for the price. It was nice that they included a pair of white gloves, so you wouldn’t cut yourself on the metal poles, and a small wooden mallet for tapping the pieces together. They also include one extra of each part. Awesome.BUT one of the bags that holds the poles had been torn open, and apparently a couple poles fell out. So I was one pole short and unable to complete putting it together. I contacted the seller, who reached out to me immediately, and told me another would be on the way. I was completely surprised when the next day I received an entire new shoe shelf. I am beyond amazed at the customer service. I’ve had several terrible experiences with customer service through vendors here on Amazon, that this one was really outstanding. 100 stars for customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is on par for the price
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack was relatively simple to assemble. It's very lightweight, but does the job. It came with spare parts, which were necessary, as there were some small quality issues. The picture I attached is an example of one of the flawed parts, which would've still been useable...but I appreciated having an extra to take it's place. Overall, it looks nice, went together easily, and it was cheap. I'd recommend it. (They did offer a $20 gift card for a 5 star review, but I would've given it five stars regardless).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits so many shoes!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack has added some much needed storage space to our mudroom. We previously had bins for the kids’ shoes, but it always looked messy and the shoes were hard to find. Now there is plenty of space for all their shoes, they are neat and clean, and easy to spot the pair you are looking for! I don’t think I would put anything much heavier than shoes on the shelves, but they are great for shoes. The first set I ordered I put up in a spot where my large dog likes to look out the window, and he did tear the top two shelves-customer service was great and they sent me a replacement right away! Now I know to keep it in a spot where the dog won’t jump up on it. I also have a smaller one for me and my husband’s shoes, and it is just as great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for price
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to put together and seems sturdy enough. Downside is that you can only put boots on the very top due to the height of the other shelves once put together.
